casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Garland Edward PITTMAN. No. 135P02-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 3, 2005. Garland Edward Pittman, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 10th day of January 2005 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Buncombe County:

"Denied by order of the Court in Conference this the 3rd day of February 2005."
